column4: where can i get help on empathy?  i have an issue with LCS/OCS pidgin-sipe in empathy.  I cannot seem to get the settings right.  It looks like from the debug it is attempting to prompt me to accept an unknown root authority which is what happened under pidgin, but empathy never gives me the notification
You can get help in #empathy of the URL    irc://irc.gimp.org/empathy
